Issue tracking for modern software teams: 为现代软件团队跟踪问题
\nTo obtain your API key, follow these s:
To obtain your API key, follow these steps:

1. Go to settings by clicking your profile-pic (top-left)
2. Go to API section inside My Account.
3. On Personal API keys, give label and press create key.
Create a new issue in Linear workspace: 在线性工作区中创建一个新问题
Update a issue in Linear Workspace: 更新线性工作区中的问题
Create a new project in Linear workspace: 在线性工作区中创建一个新项目
Update a existing project in Linear work: 更新线性工作区中已有的项目
Create a new comment on an issue in Line: 在线性工作区中创建一个新的问题
Title: 标题
The team for which the issue, project or: 将创建此问题、项目或评论的团队
Triggers when Linear receives a new issu: 线性收到新问题时触发

删除现有线性问题时触发
